album.strDescriptionEN:
"Double Negative"  is the twelfth studio album by American indie rock group Low, released on September 14, 2018 on the Sub Pop label. The album was produced by B.J. Burton.
On Metacritic, which assigns a normalized rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, Double Negative has an average score of 86 based on 20 reviews, indicating "universal acclaim".
